column4: I have a standard ubuntu install and I want to install software from my Ubuntu UE dvd. How can I do this?
-> mount your dvd and then search for the deb file you wanted then install it via dpkg -i
I found lots of .deb but I don't see everything. Would I be able to use Synaptic?
-> dont know, maybe if the dvd is on the sources.list ? i never tried it myself
